description: Filter expressions that can be referenced across multiple features, e.g. [Firewall Rule](firewall_rule.html). The expression format is similar to [Wireshark Display Filter](https://www.wireshark.org/docs/man-pages/wireshark-filter.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: A note that you can use to describe the purpose of the filter.

Expression.description: The filter expression to be used.

Paused.description: Whether this filter is currently paused. Boolean value.

Ref.description: Short reference tag to quickly select related rules.

ZoneId.description: The DNS zone to which the Filter should be added.
